main event: On October 6, 1967, several witnesses in Milledgeville, Georgia observed an unidentified flying object (UFO) that displayed bright lights and unusual flight characteristics.
interesting points: Multiple witnesses, including base personnel, reported seeing a large, glowing disc-shaped object hovering in the sky., Mr. John Doe reported seeing a bright, white light that left a trail of vapor as it moved., The object was estimated to be 75-100 feet in diameter and shot straight up at a high speed after hovering., One witness observed the object for about 15 minutes before it rapidly accelerated and disappeared from view., A photograph showing a dark blurred object in the sky was included in the investigation.
witness description: various local residents and military personnel
